short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Change your new tab page launcher to Amazon! The quickest path to shopping on Amazon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
